seo.title: Legal Document Management Software — AI Search, OCR, and Extraction for Law Firms
seo.description: Go beyond basic file storage with AI-powered document management for law firms. Dodonai automates summarization, OCR, search, and data extraction across case files, discovery, and medical records.

hero.headline: Intelligent Document Management for Law Firms
hero.subheadline: Your DMS stores files. Dodonai processes them — producing AI-powered summaries, searchable transcripts, OCR-corrected scans, and structured extracts that turn passive storage into an active intelligence layer for attorneys.

sections.heading: Why Law Firms Need More Than File Storage
paragraphs: Every law firm has a document management problem, and it isn't about storage. Firms have no trouble saving files to shared drives, case management platforms, or cloud folders. The problem is that the documents sitting in those systems are largely unprocessed — unread transcripts, unsummarized medical records, scanned files that aren't searchable, and discovery productions that no one has time to review page by page.
The documents are stored, but the information inside them is not accessible.

Intelligent document management for attorneys closes that gap. Instead of treating documents as static files to be retrieved by filename, Dodonai processes the content of every document you upload. Medical records become structured chronologies. Deposition transcripts become searchable, cited summaries. Scanned PDFs become fully readable text through {{link:/ai-pdf-ocr/|AI-powered OCR}}. Discovery productions become filterable, reviewable datasets.

For litigation teams, this means attorneys and paralegals spend less time reading and more time analyzing. Case preparation timelines compress. And work product quality improves because AI-generated outputs include references pointing back to the original documents, so every data point is verifiable.

sections.heading: Law Firm Document Management AI Capabilities

cards.title: AI-Powered Document Search
cards.description: Find what you need using natural language, not keyword matching. Dodonai's {{link:/ai-deposition-transcript-software/|transcript search}} returns results based on meaning — so 'plaintiff's shoulder injury' surfaces records even when they use different medical terminology.

cards.title: Automated Document Summarization
cards.description: Upload deposition transcripts or medical records and get structured summaries within minutes. {{link:/deposition-summary-software/|Deposition summaries}} come with page-line citations. {{link:/ai-medical-record-summaries-chronologies/|Medical chronologies}} organize every visit, diagnosis, and treatment in order, with each entry linked back to the original page.

cards.title: AI OCR for Scanned and Legacy Files
cards.description: Scanned records, faxed documents, image-only PDFs — law firms get them all. Dodonai's {{link:/ai-pdf-ocr/|AI OCR}} converts these into searchable, extractable text, including handwritten notes and poor-quality scans that defeat standard OCR tools.

cards.title: Structured Data Extraction
cards.description: Need party names from pleadings, key dates from contracts, or billing totals from medical records? {{link:/dodonai-extract-and-draft-agents/|Extract and Draft Agents}} pull specific data points at scale and export to Excel, Word, or PDF.

cards.title: E-Discovery Document Review
cards.description: Process large discovery productions with {{link:/electronic-discovery-software/|Dodonai's e-discovery tools}}. Search, filter, and review thousands of documents to surface what matters most — reducing the volume that requires manual attorney review.

items.title: Upload Documents from Any Source
items.description: Upload case files directly from your DMS, local drive, or email. The platform accepts PDFs, Word documents, text files, scanned images, and mixed-format files — no preprocessing or reformatting required.

items.title: AI Processes and Structures the Content
items.description: Select the processing type: deposition summary, medical chronology, transcript search, OCR conversion, data extraction, or e-discovery review. Dodonai reads the full document and produces a structured output. Add key topics or date ranges to customize results.

items.title: Export Organized Work Product
items.description: Download as PDF, Word, Excel, or plain text and save it back to your DMS. Every output includes page references for quick verification against the original document.

faq.question: Does Dodonai replace our existing document management system?
faq.answer: No — Dodonai is a processing layer that sits alongside your existing DMS. You keep using your current system for storage and access control. Dodonai handles the AI-powered summarization, search, and extraction, and you save the structured outputs back into your system.

faq.question: What types of documents can Dodonai process?
faq.answer: Deposition transcripts, medical records, discovery productions, contracts, pleadings, expert reports, and more. The {{link:/ai-pdf-ocr/|AI OCR}} feature handles scanned documents, faxed records, and image-only PDFs.

faq.question: How does Dodonai handle document security and confidentiality?
faq.answer: Every document gets AES-256 encryption on HIPAA-compliant, SOC 2-certified infrastructure. We sign BAAs, don't train on your data, and you control when files get deleted.

faq.question: Can multiple people at the firm use the same account?
faq.answer: Yes. Dodonai supports team accounts with a shared credit pool. Plans are based on page volume, not user seats, so adding team members doesn't increase cost.

faq.question: How does Dodonai compare to traditional document management systems like iManage or NetDocuments?
faq.answer: Traditional DMS platforms handle storage and access control. Dodonai handles what comes after — AI summarization, OCR, search, and extraction. The two are complementary. See our {{link:/industries/law-firm-case-management/|case management page}} for more on the workflow.
